__e: Often it's easier to believe lies than the truth.
He believed the lie I told him about you.
ls this how you lied to him?
Even if I lied for your sake, a lie is always a lie.
There's nothing doing because you're a liar
"The bigger the lie, the more people will believe it."
I tried to live a lie to please you.
The truth for everyone but you, with blind eyes and mind!
So all you need to do is lie low and allow the hunt to continue.
Somebody like him asked me, too, and it made me happy until I woke up one morning, and found out it was just another lie.
It's a movie, another invention, another lie.
Which is the greatest lie of all time?
All this is a lie and you know very well it is.
That filth is a lie, and we both Know it.
Of course you know what a lie is and what the truth is, don't you?
- Is art a lie that tells the truth?
"the truth is a lie that hasn't been found out".
"a lie that makes us... realize the truth. "
